hymn.title: IMI MURI IZWI
hymn.subtitle: O Bright, Eternal One
lyrics: Imi muri izwi Rakasika mwenje Nayo mvonga mvonga Ikave rufaro
Izwi rakavanda, Tokuona zvino Napatinofamba, Kristu, ari pano.
Togara maari, Iye wokudenga; Ngatimutsvagei, Dakara tamuda.
O, Ishe, mupenyu, Mwoyo yodudzira Runako rwenyu, â€˜She, Nokubwinya kwenyu.
hymn.author: Catherine Baird (1896-1984)
